item.title: Upgrading Quartz
item.description: Note This is specifically a guide for upgrading Quartz 4 version to a more recent update.

item.title: Setting up your GitHub repository
item.description: First, make sure you have Quartz cloned and setup locally. Then, create a new repository on GitHub.com.

item.title: Quartz Showcase
item.description: Want to see what Quartz can do? Here are some cool community gardens: Quartz Documentation (this site!) Jacky Zhao’s Garden Aaron Pham’s Garden The Pond Eilleen’s Everything Notebook Morrowind Modding Wiki Stanford CME 302 Numerical Linear Algebra Socratica Toolbox A Pattern Language - Christopher A...

item.title: Components
item.description: Want to create your own custom component? Check out the advanced guide on creating components for more information.

item.title: Static
item.description: This plugin emits all static resources needed by Quartz.

item.title: SyntaxHighlighting
item.description: This plugin is used to add syntax highlighting to code blocks in Quartz. See syntax highlighting for more information.

item.title: TableOfContents
item.description: This plugin generates a table of contents (TOC) for Markdown documents. See table of contents for more information.

item.title: TagPage
item.description: This plugin emits dedicated pages for each tag used in the content. See folder and tag listings for more information.
